100000.eng: You’re finally here. The prophecy is about to be fulfilled. You are the future King of Noxus!
100000.tc: 您終於來了，預言即將成為現實，未來的諾克薩斯之王！

100001.eng: You seem confused, but don't worry, you'll understand soon.
100001.tc: 看起來您很困惑，沒關係，很快您就明白了

100002.eng: Your subjects have prepared some gifts to welcome you. Please accept them.
100002.tc: 您的臣民為了迎接您的到來，準備了一些見面禮，還請接受

100100.eng: As you can see, our kingdom has been ravaged by enemies. All the buildings have been reduced to ruins.
100100.tc: 如您所見，我們的王國遭受到敵人的掠奪，所有建築都被夷為廢墟

100101.eng: Restoring the former glory of Noxus begins with repairing the Town Hall.
100101.tc: 要重整諾克薩斯的往日榮光，需要從修復市政廳開始

100102.eng: Everything is proceeding as planned. Once the Town Hall is restored, you can build other structures.
100102.tc: 一切都按照計畫在進行，有了市政廳就能修建其他更多建築了

100200.eng: To fend off imminent enemy attacks, we need to establish our own army first.
100200.tc: 為了抵禦敵人隨時而來的襲擊，我們需要先組建自己的軍隊

100201.eng: Building a Barracks will provide us with a steady supply of soldiers.
100201.tc: 修建了募兵處，就能為我們源源不斷提供兵源了

100202.eng: See, that was easy! Now it’s time to recruit some soldiers.
100202.tc: 看，很容易吧，那接下來就是要招募士兵了

100300.eng: The size of the army is influenced by the number of houses. To recruit more soldiers, we need to build more houses.
100300.tc: 軍隊的規模受房屋影響，想要招募更多士兵，那就需要修建更多房屋

100400.eng: The people of Noxus have never feared war, and they take pride in joining the army to defend their homeland.
100400.tc: 諾克薩斯的子民從來不懼怕戰爭，也以加入守衛家園的軍隊為榮

100401.eng: Just make sure to provide enough rations.

100402.eng: A strong army is essential for rebuilding the royal city.
100402.tc: 擁有一支具有戰鬥力的軍隊是重建王城的根本

100500.eng: Rapid development cannot rely on the current limited resources.
100500.tc: 想要快速發展，僅靠現在的這點資源是遠遠不夠的

100501.eng: Sending the army outside the city to gather resources is the safest way to acquire them.
100501.tc: 將軍隊派到城外去採集資源，是最為安全獲取資源的方式

100502.eng: Resources are the root cause of all wars.
100502.tc: 資源，所有戰爭的根源都是為了爭奪資源

100600.eng: Oh, there’s another special resource called PIOT.
100600.tc: 對了，還有一種特殊的資源叫做PIOT

100601.eng: Those who possess PIOT can become rulers with governing authority in the world.
100601.tc: 擁有PIOT的人可以成為擁有治理權的世界主宰

100602.eng: Using PIOT can directly increase Heat Value, and it can also be used to speed up actions, acquire extra resources, and enhance your returns.
100602.tc: 使用PIOT可以直接增加熱力值，並且PIOT還可以用於行動提速，額外獲取資源等提升你收益的作用

100603.eng: Heat Value is closely tied to treasure chests. The higher your Heat Value, the more treasure chests you can open daily, increasing your chances of obtaining high-quality rewards.
100603.tc: 熱力值是一個與寶箱緊密聯繫的數值，熱力值越高，每日可開啟的寶箱數量越多，獲得高品質獎勵的機會也將提升

100700.eng: Treasure chests are the core of your income in this world. Your rewards and the resources that support your actions in the world can all be obtained through treasure chests.
100700.tc: 寶箱是你在世界中獲得收益的核心，你的收益和支撐你在世界中行動的資源都可以通過寶箱獲得

100701.eng: However, the rewards inside treasure chests are shared by all users, so you need to find ways to claim high-quality rewards before others do.
100701.tc: 但是寶箱內的獎勵是所有用戶共用的，所以你需要想方設法的比其他人先獲得寶箱內的高品質獎勵。

100702.eng: You’re still a bit confused, aren’t you? No worries, open a treasure chest and see what we can get.
100702.tc: 你肯定還有些困惑，沒關係，先開一個寶箱，看我們能獲得什麼

100703.eng: Wow, we’ve obtained Psyche Energy, which we usually refer to as PSYC. Your actions will require the support of PSYC.
100703.tc: 哇哦，我們獲得了靈能，通常我們也稱之為PSYC，你的行動都將會需要PSYC的支持

100800.eng: Curious about what exactly PSYC does?
100800.tc: 是不是想知道PSYC具體有什麼作用？

100801.eng: Don’t rush. To make our army stronger, let’s build a Barracks first.
100801.tc: 不急，為了讓我們的軍隊更具有戰鬥力，先修建兵營

100900.eng: Next, train the soldiers to make our army more powerful.
100900.tc: 接著訓練士兵，讓我們的軍隊更具有戰鬥力

100901.eng: Having an army with different types of units will allow us to handle various complex war scenarios.
100901.tc: 擁有不同兵種的軍隊，能讓我們應對各種複雜的戰爭環境

100902.eng: Take it step by step; we’ll start by training the most basic infantry.
100902.tc: 慢慢來，我們先訓練最為初級的步兵

101000.eng: After all that preparation, let’s have the young man face a real challenge.
101000.tc: 鋪墊了那麼久，讓小夥子真正接受一場挑戰吧

101001.eng: Do you see that enemy outside the city? They’re just scattered troops, nothing to fear.
101001.tc: 看到城外的那個敵人了嗎，散兵游勇，不足為懼

101002.eng: Let our blades taste the blood of the enemy!
101002.tc: 讓我們的利刃品嘗敵人的鮮血吧！

101100.eng: A simple battle doesn’t mean we’re strong enough.
101100.tc: 輕而易舉的戰鬥並不能代表我們已經足夠強大

101101.eng: Training commanding officers can effectively enhance the combat power of the army.
101101.tc: 訓練帶兵的將領，能有效地提升軍隊的戰鬥力

101102.eng: The simplest way is to level them up.
101102.tc: 最為簡單的方式，提升他們的等級

101200.eng: On this continent, there are countless others like you who have been summoned.
101200.tc: 在這片大陸上，有著無數個如你一樣被召喚而來的人

101201.eng: But there will only be one King of Noxus. Will it be you?
101201.tc: 但諾克薩斯之王只會有一個，會是你嗎？

101202.eng: I don’t know! But I hope it’s you.
101202.tc: 我不知道！但我希望是你

101203.eng: Go check out your neighboring friends. Let’s see who’s the imposter!
101203.tc: 去看看你周圍的好鄰居吧，讓我看看誰才是冒牌貨！

104002.eng: Server not responding…Please try again later
104002.tc: 伺服器沒有回應…請稍後再試

104005.eng: You are going to spend %s PIOT, Confirm?
104005.tc: 你即將花費 %s PIOT，確認嗎？

104006.eng: You can change settings by clicking the player avatar in the top-left corner.
104006.tc: 你可以通過點擊左上角的玩家頭像來更改設置。

106001.eng: %s is dead, please wait for the rebirth…

106006.eng: Let %s LOSS %s, and NO skill book returned, confirm?
106006.tc: 讓 %s 失去 %s，並且沒有技能書返回，確認嗎？

106008.eng:
The rewards from the World Treasure Chest are affected by civilization level, heat value, and exploration value.

- Civilization Level: Higher levels increase the quality of chests and daily opening limits, and the chance to find rare items.

- Heat Value: Earned through PSYC and PIOT consumption, it raises the odds of getting head rewards from chests.

- Exploration Value: Gained by exploring, gathering, building, and warring, it grants opportunities to open the World Treasure Chest.
106008.tc:
世界寶藏箱的獎勵受到文明等級、熱值和探索值的影響。

文明等級：等級越高，寶箱的質量和每日開箱限制增加，並且有更高機會找到稀有物品。

熱值：通過 PSYC 和 PIOT 消費獲得，它提高了從寶箱中獲得頭獎的機率。

探索值：通過探索、收集、建造和戰爭獲得，它賦予你開啟世界寶藏箱的機會。

106015.eng: Map and Teasure chest refresh countdown:
106015.tc: 地圖和寶藏箱刷新倒數計時：

106016.eng:
1.After building the intelligence station, the reconnaissance function can be used.

2.The reconnaissance function can detect the combat power of other players in the main city, and can dispel a certain range of fog through fog reconnaissance.

3.Upgrading the intelligence station can increase the range of dispelling fog.
106016.tc:
1.建造情報站後，即可使用偵察功能。

2.偵察功能可以偵察其他玩家主城的戰鬥力，對迷霧偵察可以驅散一定範圍的迷霧。

3.陞級情報站可以提升驅散迷霧的範圍。

106017.eng:
1.After the establishment of the recruitment committee, conscription can be carried out.

2.When recruiting through the recruitment committee, the number of troops cannot exceed the upper limit of the recruitment committee's capacity, nor can it exceed the population limit.

3.After upgrading the recruitment committee, it can increase the speed of recruitment and the upper limit of accommodating troops, while also reducing the consumption of recruitment.
106017.tc:
1.建造募兵委後，即可以進行徵兵。

2.通過募兵委徵兵時，兵力不能超過募兵委容納兵力的上限，同時也不能超過人口上限。

3.募兵委升級後，可提升募兵的速度與容納兵力的上限，同時還會降低募兵的消耗。

106018.eng:
1.After building the barracks, the soldiers recruited by the recruitment committee can be trained into other branches of the army.

2.The individual health of different branches of the army varies, and the training costs and time also differ.

3.Upgrading the barracks can unlock more trainable units.
106018.tc:
1.建造兵營後，即可將募兵委徵召的阿兵哥訓練成其他兵種。

2.不同兵種的單兵血量不同，訓練費用與訓練時間也不同。

3.陞級兵營可以解鎖更多可訓練的兵種。

106019.eng:
1.Upgrading one's residence can increase the population limit.

2.Soldiers in the recruitment committee, various branches of troops in the barracks, and troops led by characters shall be counted towards the total population, and the total population shall not exceed the population limit.
106019.tc:
1.陞級居所可提升人口上限。

2.募兵委中的阿兵哥，兵營中的各種兵種，角色帶領的部隊，都會計入人口總數，人口總數不得超過人口上限。

106020.eng:
1.Only after building the city hall can other buildings be constructed.

2.The level of other buildings cannot exceed that of the city hall.

3.Upgrading the level of the city hall can increase the upper limit of the level of other buildings.
106020.tc:
1.建造市政廳後才能建造其他建築。

2.其他建築的等級無法超出市政廳的等級。

3.陞級市政廳等級即可提升其他建築的等級上限。

106021.eng:
1.After building the Tower of Babel, players can enshrine artifacts in the tower, and the enshrined artifacts will have the attribute effects of the artifact. At the same time, players can use three artifacts to forge a new artifact.

2.After upgrading the Tower of Babel, players can unlock more artifact worship slots and obtain more artifact effects at the same time.
106021.tc:
1.建築巴別塔後，玩家可以將神器供奉在巴別塔中，被供奉的神器將發貨神器的内容效果，同時玩家可以用三個神器重新熔煉出一個新神器。

2.玩家陞級巴別塔後，可以解鎖更多的神器供奉比特，玩家可以同時獲得更多的神器效果。

117001.eng: Also known as Eye of Ramesses, it symbolizes Egypt's prosperity and peace, blessed by divine power
117001.tc: 也被稱為拉美西斯之眼，它象徵著埃及的繁榮與和平，受到神聖力量的祝福

117002.eng: With this weapon, people brought an end to the era of the giant beasts' rule.
117002.tc: 有了這種武器，人們結束了巨獸統治的時代。

117003.eng: The terrifying teeth of the giant land shark, with their sharp serrated edges, can easily slice through the flesh and skin of their prey.
117003.tc: 巨陸鯊可怕的牙齒，鋒利的鋸齒邊緣，可以輕易地切開獵物的肉和皮膚。

117004.eng: The crystal skull imbued with mysterious powers, said to allow communication with the spirits.
117004.tc: 充滿神秘力量的水晶骷髏，據說可以與靈魂交流。

117005.eng: The stinger of the desert giant scorpion, capable of killing its prey by piercing through them, even without the venom.
117005.tc: 沙漠巨蠍的刺針，能夠穿透獵物，即使沒有毒素也能致命。

117006.eng: The divine spear that once pierced the body of a saint, also known as the Spear of Destiny.
117006.tc: 曾經穿透聖人身體的神聖長矛，也被稱為命運之矛。

117007.eng: The stone inscribed with mystical writings, containing unknown forces within.
117007.tc: 刻有神秘文字的石頭，內含未知的力量。

117008.eng: The crystal cluster that emits a dazzling light, rejuvenating the wearer's energy.
117008.tc: 發出耀眼光芒的水晶簇，恢復佩戴者的能量。

117009.eng: The energy gemstone that has lost its original power.
117009.tc: 失去原始力量的能量寶石。

117010.eng: An old axe, used to belong to someone.
117010.tc: 一把古老的斧頭，曾經屬於某人。

117011.eng: Not just for navigation but a diviner of one's deepest truths and desires.
117011.tc: 不僅用於導航，還是一個占卜者最深真理和渴望的工具。

117012.eng: Ancient stone tablets inscribed with the Ten Commandments, symbolizing divine law and moral guidance.
117012.tc: 刻有十誡的古代石碑，象徵神聖法律和道德指導。

117013.eng: A delicately carved jade artifact, often used as a ceremonial tool in ancient Chinese rituals.
117013.tc: 精細雕刻的玉藝術品，常在古代中國的儀式中作為儀式工具使用。

117014.eng: A model of the celestial sphere, representing the heavens and used for astronomical navigation and study.
117014.tc: 代表天體的模型，用於天文導航和研究。

117015.eng: A timekeeping device with flowing sand, a metaphor for the relentless passage of time.
117015.tc: 一個流沙計時器，是無情時間流逝的隱喻。

117016.eng: A symbol of infinity and self-renewal, depicting a serpent eating its own tail.
117016.tc: 無限和自我更新的象徵，描繪一條吞食自己尾巴的蛇。

117017.eng: A lotus flower representing purity and enlightenment, often associated with Buddhist concepts of spiritual awakening.
117017.tc: 代表純淨和啟蒙的蓮花，常與佛教精神覺醒的概念相關聯。

117018.eng: A small, colorful bead with a glossy finish, used in jewelry and as a status symbol in ancient cultures.
117018.tc: 一個小而多彩的珠子，有光澤的外表，用於珠寶和古代文化中的地位象徵。

117019.eng: A golden representation of the scarab beetle, revered in ancient Egypt as a symbol of rebirth and transformation.
117019.tc: 金色的聖甲蟲形象，被古代埃及人崇敬為重生和轉變的象徵。

117020.eng: A crown adorned with thorns, symbolizing sacrifice and suffering, often associated with religious martyrdom.
117020.tc: 帶有棘刺的王冠，象徵犧牲和痛苦，常與宗教殉道者相關聯。

117021.eng: A navigational instrument used to measure the angular distance between celestial bodies and the horizon.
117021.tc: 用於測量天體與地平線之間角距的導航儀器。

117022.eng: An early firearm with a flint ignition mechanism, a symbol of the technological advancements of the early modern period.
117022.tc: 早期火器，帶有火石點火機制，是早期現代時期技術進步的象徵。

117023.eng: A mythical cauldron from Chinese legend, said to have the power to unify the nine provinces and bring peace.
117023.tc: 中國傳說中的神話大鍋，據說有統一天下九省並帶來和平的力量。

117024.eng: A wind instrument from antiquity, used in both warfare for signaling and in ceremonies for its resonant sound.
117024.tc: 古代的風樂器，用於戰爭信號和儀式中，因其共鳴聲而使用。

117025.eng: The central component of a mechanical device, often intricate and complex, symbolizing the ingenuity of engineering.
117025.tc: 機械裝置的核心部件，通常錯綜複雜，象徵工程的巧妙。

117026.eng: A meteorite believed to possess mystical powers, associated with psychic phenomena and cosmic energy.
117026.tc: 被認為擁有神秘力量的隕石，與心理現象和宇宙能量相關聯。

117027.eng: A fan associated with the Tengu, a mythical creature from Japanese folklore, known for its sharp wit and martial prowess.
117027.tc: 與日本民間傳說中的天狗有關的扇子，以其銳利的智慧和武術能力而聞名。

117028.eng: Optical instruments for observing distant objects, enhancing the viewer's perspective and understanding of the world.
117028.tc: 用於觀察遙遠物體的光學儀器，增強觀察者的視角和對世界的了解。

117029.eng: A jade carving depicting two fish, often symbolizing harmony, abundance, and the unity of yin and yang.
117029.tc: 雕刻兩條魚的玉雕，通常象徵和諧、豐盛和陰陽的統一。

117030.eng: A lens made of crystal, prized for its clarity and used in early optical devices for magnification and illumination.
117030.tc: 用水晶製成的鏡片，因其清晰度而受到珍視，用於早期的放大和照明光學設備。

117031.eng: A ceremonial mace used in religious rituals to ward off evil spirits and protect the faithful.
117031.tc: 用於宗教儀式以驅逐邪靈並保護信徒的儀式錘。

117032.eng: The crown of a sovereign, often adorned with sun motifs, representing the ruler's divine right and power.
117032.tc: 一個主權者的王冠，通常裝飾有太陽圖案，代表統治者的神聖權力和力量。

117033.eng: A vessel from a bygone era, crafted with simple yet enduring techniques, reflecting the daily life of ancient civilizations.
117033.tc: 一個古老時代的容器，用簡單而持久的技術製作，反映了古代文明的日常生活。

117034.eng: A handheld source of light, often used in ancient times for navigation and signaling in the darkness.
117034.tc: 一個手持光源，通常用於古代導航和在黑暗中發信號。

117035.eng: A U-shaped piece of metal attached to a horse's hoof, believed to bring good luck and protect against evil.
117035.tc: 馬蹄鐵附在馬蹄上，被認為帶來好運並保護免受邪惡。

117036.eng: A simple wheel made of wood, a fundamental component of early transportation and machinery.
117036.tc: 一個簡單的木製輪子，是早期交通和機械的基本組件。

117037.eng: A gear with visible wear or breakage, a reminder of the passage of time and the inevitability of decay.
117037.tc: 一個有明顯磨損或損壞的齒輪，提醒時間的流逝和衰敗的必然性。

117100.eng: These warriors are the most common combat units on the wasteland, usually ordinary people who have now picked up weapons to survive. Their equipment is rudimentary, mainly relying on
117100.tc: 这些战士是废土上最常见的战斗单位，通常是曾经的普通人，现在为了生存而拿起了武器。他们的装备简陋，主要依

117101.eng: These soldiers are destitute warriors wandering among the wasteland, familiar with the terrain and environment, and able to quickly adapt to various battlefield environments.
117101.tc: 这些战士是游走于废土之间的落魄战士，熟悉地形和环境，能够快速适应各种战场环境。

117102.eng: Warriors who survive in wasteland are more organized, have a fierce combat style, and are skilled in surprise attacks and ambushes.
117102.tc: 在废土中生存下来的战士，组织更加严密，作战风格凶悍，擅长突袭和伏击。

117103.eng: These soldiers have been exposed to radiation for a long time, causing their bodies to mutate and become stronger and more durable. Their equipment has been further enhanced, possessing a certain level of radiation resistance and the ability to utilize the surrounding environment for combat
117103.tc: 这些战士长期暴露在辐射环境中，身体发生了变异，变得更加强悍和耐打。他们的装备进一步增强，具备一定的抗辐射能力，并且可以利用周围环境进行作战。

117104.eng: These warriors are the most elite beings on the wasteland, equipped with high-tech armor reconstructed from waste technology. They can withstand huge damage and have the ability to counterattack enemies. Steel guardians are usually the core force of the entire army.
117104.tc: 这些战士是废土上最精锐的存在，装备着用废旧科技重组的高科技盔甲。他们可以承受巨大的伤害并且有能力反击敌人。钢铁卫士通常是整个军队的核心力量。

117105.eng: The Apocalypse Legion is one of the most powerful warriors on the battlefield, with equipment and combat power several times that of other units. These soldiers are not only powerful in combat, but also able to command and inspire other soldiers to play a greater role in battle.
117105.tc: 末日军团是战场上最强大的战士之一，他们的装备和战斗力都是其他单位的数倍。这些战士不仅战斗力强大，还能够指挥和激励其他战士，让他们在战斗中发挥更大的作用。

117106.eng: The highest level warriors and commanders not only possess exceptional combat power, but also wield the most powerful weapons and resources, and are capable of commanding an entire army.
117106.tc: 最高级别的战士和指挥官，他们不仅拥有超强的战斗力，还掌握着最强大的武器和资源，并且够指挥整支军队。

121001.eng: More buildings are able to be constructed
121001.tc: 可以建造更多的建築物

121003.eng: More citizens are able to be contained

121004.eng: Can increase reconnaissance field of view

121005.eng: More Relics are able to be acitved

121006.eng: Can train more types of troops

200002.eng: Please explore more to get it

201001.eng: The building is being upgraded, please wait.

201003.eng: The building is being upgraded, please wait.

203005.tc: 先鋒正在處理一個事件

206004.eng: Gunman as Graceful as a Gazelle
206004.tc: 像瞪羚一樣優雅的槍手

206005.eng: Warrior as Wild as the Wind

206006.eng: Berserker as Fearless as a Beast
206006.tc: 像野獸一樣無畏的狂戰士

310101.eng: You found and entered a cave.
310101.tc: 你發現並進入了一個洞穴。

310102.eng: You encounter a small swarm of sand spiders and fight them.
310102.tc: 你遇到了一小群沙蜘蛛並與它們戰鬥。

310103.eng: You killed the spiders, and found some spider cocoons with different shapes.
310103.tc: 你殺死了蜘蛛，並發現了一些不同形狀的蜘蛛繭。

310104.eng: You are killed by the spiders!

310105.eng: You opened the human-shaped cocoons and you found some humans who are not dead yet.
310105.tc: 你打開了人形繭，發現了一些還沒有死的人。

310106.eng: You opened the egg-shaped cocoons and...

310107.eng: Those who were saved by you decided to join you!
310107.tc: 被你救出的人決定加入你！

310108.eng: And they also gave you some resources.
310108.tc: 他們還給了你一些資源。

310109.eng: Surprise! Another swarm of sand spiders!

310110.eng: You killed the spiders, and found some resources.
310110.tc: 你殺死了蜘蛛，並發現了一些資源。

310111.eng: You are killed by the spiders!

310112.eng: You continued deeper into the cave and eventually discovered the spider queen.
310112.tc: 你繼續深入洞穴，最終發現了蜘蛛女王。

310113.eng: You killed the spider queen and obtained her treasure.
310113.tc: 你殺死了蜘蛛女王並獲得了她的寶藏。

310114.eng: You are killed by the spider queen!

310201.tc: 你發現了一個古老的存在。

310205.eng: You killed the guardian and got a special token.
310205.tc: 你殺死了守護者並獲得了一個特殊代幣。

310206.eng: You are killed by the guardian.

310208.eng: You reached the door to the last room.
310208.tc: 你到達了最後房間的門。

310209.eng: You found a secret entry and you are considering how to get into it.
310209.tc: 你發現了一個秘密入口，正在考慮如何進入。

310210.eng: You made a rope and used it to get into the ancient.
310210.tc: 你做了一根繩子並用它進入了古老的地方。

310211.eng: You jumped into the ancient and lost a little HP.
310211.tc: 你跳進了古老的地方並失去了一些HP。

310212.eng: You got into the ancient and found a mecha-mon waiting for you.
310212.tc: 你進入了古老的地方並發現了一個機甲怪物在等你。

310213.eng: You destroyed the mecha-mon and got a special token.
310213.tc: 你摧毀了機甲怪物並獲得了一個特殊代幣。

310216.eng: Do you want to use the token to open the big box?
310216.tc: 你想用代幣打開大箱子嗎？

310217.eng: You opened the big treasure box and gain a lot!
310217.tc: 你打開了大寶藏箱並獲得了很多！

310218.eng: You could not obtain the big reward, so you took away a few resources.
310218.tc: 你沒能獲得大獎，所以拿走了一些資源。

310301.eng: You entered a deserted lab and encountered a dangerous guardian.
310301.tc: 你進入了一個荒蕪的實驗室並遇到了一個危險的守護者。

310302.eng: You killed the guardian and now you are considering which way to go.
310302.tc: 你殺死了守護者，現在你在考慮該走哪條路。

310304.eng: You found a few resources in the warehouse.
310304.tc: 你在倉庫裡找到了一些資源。

310305.eng: You found a broken tube in the energy room.
310305.tc: 你在能量房裡發現了一個破損的管道。

310307.eng: You got a lot of energy.

310309.eng: You came to the cave in the village and found a colony of bats
310309.tc: 你來到了村莊的洞穴並發現了一個蝙蝠群落

310310.eng: You shooed away the bats and entered the cave.
310310.tc: 你趕走了蝙蝠並進入了洞穴。

310311.eng: You trash killed by the bats??? Are you kidding me???

310312.eng: In the depths of the cave, you saw a guard standing in front of a door. You need to show it something.
310312.tc: 你在洞穴深處看到一個守衛站在門前。你需要向它展示些什麼。

310313.eng: You showed it the Elder's Staff and the guard took you into the room behind the door.
310313.tc: 你向它展示了長者的法杖，守衛把你帶進了門後的房間。

310314.eng: In the room, you saw the Energy Gemstone which is sustaining the entire base of the village. You can feel the immense power contained within this stone, and now you are faced with a choice.
310314.tc: 在房間裡，你看到了維持整個村莊基地的能源寶石。你可以感受到這塊石頭內蘊含的巨大力量，現在你面臨一個選擇。

310315.eng: You followed your heart and took the Energy Gemstone directly.
310315.tc: 你跟隨你的心，直接拿走了能源寶石。

310316.eng: You resisted the temptation and decided to help the village by recharging the stone.
310316.tc: 你抵擋住了誘惑，決定通過充電來幫助村莊。

310317.eng: After removing the Energy Gemstone from its base, it instantly lost its luster and became dim. Before you had time to ponder, the entire cavern began to shake, emitting a tremendous noise. You hastily grabbed the stone and fled from the area.
310317.tc: 當你從其基座上移開能源寶石後，它立刻失去了光澤並變得暗淡。在你還來不及思考之前，整個洞穴開始震動，發出巨大的噪音。你匆忙抓住石頭並從該地區逃離。

310318.eng: With your help, the village regained its vitality.
310318.tc: 在你的幫助下，村莊恢復了生氣。

310319.eng: You had nothing to show it.
310319.tc: 你沒有什麼可以展示的。

310320.eng: You are killed by the guard.

310321.eng: After defeating the guard, you entered the room behind the door and there, you discovered a gemstone imbued with immense power.
310321.tc: 在擊敗守衛後，你進入了門後的房間，在那裡，你發現了一塊充滿巨大力量的寶石。

310322.eng: You took the gemstone without hesitation.
310322.tc: 你毫不猶豫地拿走了寶石。

310323.eng: After removing the gemstone from its base, it instantly lost its luster and became dim. Before you had time to ponder, the entire cavern began to shake, emitting a tremendous noise. You hastily grabbed the stone and fled from the area.
310323.tc: 當你從其基座上移開寶石後，它立刻失去了光澤並變得暗淡。在你還來不及思考之前，整個洞穴開始震動，發出巨大的噪音。你匆忙抓住石頭並從該地區逃離。

310324.eng: At the entrance of a waterside ruin, you encountered a group of land sharks and engaged them in combat.
310324.tc: 暗淡。在你還來不及思考之前，整個洞穴開始震動，發出巨大的噪音。你匆忙抓住石頭並從該地區逃離。

310325.eng: You killed the sharks and now you should decide which way to go.
310325.tc: 在一個水邊廢墟的入口，你遇到了一群陸地鯊魚並與它們戰鬥。

310326.eng: You entered the storage room of the ruin.
310326.tc: 你殺死了鯊魚，現在你應該決定該走哪條路。

310327.eng: You came across an old robot and engaged it in battle.
310327.tc: 你進入了廢墟的儲藏室。

310328.eng: You defeated the robot and gained some energy from it.
310328.tc: 你遇到了一個老機器人並與它戰鬥。

310329.eng: You are killed by the robot!
310329.tc: 你擊敗了機器人並從它那裡獲得了一些能量。

310330.eng: You arrived at the waterside dock where boats are moored.

310331.eng: You found some supplies and a good place for fishing.
310331.tc: 你到達了停泊船隻的水邊碼頭。

310332.eng: Maybe you want to fish here?
310332.tc: 你發現了一些物資和一個好的漁場所。

310333.eng: You don’t want to waste your food.

310334.eng: You used some food as bait and caught a lot of fish.
310334.tc: 你不願意浪費你的糧食。

310335.eng: You used a significant amount of food as bait and…
310335.tc: 你用一些食物作為誘餌並捕獲了很多魚。

310336.eng: You killed the big land shark and gained the Tooth of Megalodon!
310336.tc: 你用了大量的食物作為誘餌並...

310337.eng: You are killed by the big land shark!
310337.tc: 你殺死了大陸地鯊魚並獲得了巨鯊的牙齒！

310338.eng: You are killed by the land sharks!
310338.tc: 你被大陸地鯊魚殺死了！

310340.eng: It is said that within this pyramid lies a supreme treasure, yet most people are lost in the labyrinth of the pyramid before they can find it.

310341.eng: You entered the pyramid. Soon, you encountered a fork in the road.
310341.tc: 據說這座金字塔內藏有一個至高無上的寶藏，但大多數人在找到它之前都迷失在金字塔的迷宮中。

310342.eng: You turned left. Soon, you encountered another fork.
310342.tc: 你進入了金字塔。不久，你遇到了一個岔路口。

310343.eng: You turned right. Soon, you encountered another fork.
310343.tc: 你向左转。不久，你遇到了另一個岔路口。

310344.eng: You turned right and you found that you backed to the entry.
310344.tc: 你向右转。不久，你遇到了另一個岔路口。

310345.eng: You turned left again. Soon, you encountered another fork.
310345.tc: 你向右转，發現你回到了入口。

310346.eng: You turned right again. Soon, you encountered another fork.
310346.tc: 你再次向左转。不久，你遇到了另一個岔路口。

310347.eng: You turned right and you found that you backed to the entry.
310347.tc: 你向左转，發現你回到了入口。

310348.eng: You turned left and you found a mechanical pharaoh.
310348.tc: 你向右转，發現了一個機械法老。

310349.eng: You defeated the mechanical pharaoh and got the artifact from it!
310349.tc: 你擊敗了機械法老並從它那裡獲得了神器！

310350.eng: You are killed by the pharaoh!

310351.eng: You turned left and you found that you backed to the entry.
310351.tc: 你向左转，發現你回到了入口。

310352.eng: You turned left and you found that you backed to the entry.
310352.tc: 你向左转，發現你回到了入口。

310353.eng: You turned right and you found a mechanical pharaoh.
310353.tc: 你向右转，發現了一個機械法老。

310404.eng: make a rope and use it

310407.eng: use stones to repair the tube

310417.eng: To the storage of the ruin

310418.eng: I don't want to waste my food

310421.eng: Use your energy to charge the Energy Gemstone
310421.tc: 用你的能源為能源寶石充電

310425.eng: I want to spend 100 food for a big one!
310425.tc: 我想用100食物換一個大的！

320002.eng: Flat land where you can move free.
320002.tc: 你可以自由移動的平坦土地。

402001.eng: A gem with a heavenly glow.

402004.eng: Gem of the setting sun's warmth.

402005.eng: Pure diamond of a new day's hope.
402005.tc: 純淨的鑽石，帶著新一天的希望。

402008.eng: Maybe you should show this to someone.
402008.tc: 也許你應該給某人看看這個。

402019.eng: The proof given by the chief.

402020.eng: One of the basic resources in this world. You may get foods from Desert Oasis.
402020.tc: 這是這個世界的基本資源。你可以從沙漠綠洲獲得食物。

402021.eng: One of the basic resources in this world. You may get woods from Deadwood Marsh.
402021.tc: 這是這個世界的基本資源。你可以從枯木沼澤獲得木材。

402022.eng: One of the basic resources in this world. You may get stones from Desert Grotto.
402022.tc: 這是這個世界的基本資源。你可以從沙漠石窟獲得石頭。

402023.eng: You will need this to recover your pioneers' HP. Try to recruit more through the Barrack.
402023.tc: 你將需要這個來恢復你的先鋒者的HP。試著通過兵營招募更多。

402024.eng: PSYC is the basic energy for most of your actions.
402024.tc: PSYC 是大多數你行動的基本能量。

402025.eng: You can earn more benefits by burning PIOT, such as more treasure chests, all the items inside the chests, etc.
402025.tc: 你可以通过燃燒 PIOT，例如獲得更多的寶藏箱，寶藏箱中所有的物品等等，來獲得更多好處。

501008.tc: 幫助你殺死末日幫派團隊

501017.eng: talk with prophetess, become city master
501017.tc: 與先知交談，成為城市主人

501022.eng: wait doomsdayGangBigTeam come and win fight
501022.tc: 等待末日幫派大團隊到來並贏得戰鬥

501023.eng: Defeat the gangsters outside the city.

501032.eng: Defeat the gangsters and defend the city.

501043.tc: 與某人交談以獲取信息

503002.eng: You saved me? Who are you?

503003.eng: Tinuvel, a prophetess. I've seen the vision of you leading this city to a prosperous future, and your salvation by me is the guidance of fate.
503003.tc: 汀烏韋爾，一位先知。我看到了你領導這個城市走向繁榮未來的異象，你救我一命是命運的指引。

503004.eng: What the hell? I’m just a normal one who just woke up. Your words are a bit too much information for me!
503004.tc: 什麼鬼？我只是一個剛醒來的普通人。你說的話有點信息量過大！

503005.eng: Don’t panic, I will guide you forward.

503006.eng: What do you want me to do?

503007.eng: The town’s lord was just killed by villains. It’s chaos here.
503007.tc: 這個城鎮的主人剛被壞人殺了。這裡一片混亂。

503008.eng: You’re not expecting me to fight in this state, are you?
503008.tc: 你不是指望我現在這個狀態去打架，對吧？

503011.eng: Whoever owns PIOT can rule the world.
503011.tc: 擁有 PIOT 的人可以統治世界。

503013.eng: Sure, PIOT can increase HEAT value, speed up actions, or get extra resources.
503013.tc: 當然，PIOT 可以增加熱值，加快行動速度，或者獲得額外資源。

503015.eng: Let me show you how to use PIOT first, then I’ll explain HEAT value.
503015.tc: 讓我先向你展示如何使用 PIOT，然後我會解釋熱值。

503016.eng: HEAT value is tied to treasure chests. The higher it is, the more chests you can open daily, and the better rewards you get.
503016.tc: 熱值與寶藏箱相關。熱值越高，你每天可以打開的寶箱越多，獲得的獎勵也越好。

503018.eng: It’s how you earn in this world. All users share the rewards in the chest, so you need to get the good stuff before others.
503018.tc: 這是你在這個世界賺取的方式。所有用戶共享寶箱中的獎勵，所以你必須在其他人之前獲得好東西。

503020.eng: I’ve given you a key. Try opening a chest
503020.tc: 我給了你一把鑰匙。嘗試打開一個寶箱。

503022.eng: It’s PSYC, the world’s spiritual energy. You need it for your actions.
503022.tc: 這是 PSYC，世界上的精神能量。你需要它來進行你的行動。

503023.eng: All actions? If it runs out, am I done for? Can I ask you for more?
503023.tc: 所有行動？如果它用完了，我是不是完了？我能向你再要一些嗎？

503024.eng: There’s no surplus. You saw that PSYC can be obtained from chests. You should do your task now. After that, you’ll get my reward.
503024.tc: 沒有多餘的。你看到 PSYC 可以從寶箱中獲得。你現在應該去做你的任務。完成後，你會得到我的獎勵。

503025.eng: Sounds good. What should I do now?
503025.tc: 聽起來不錯。我現在應該做什麼？

503026.eng: See those villains? Take them out!

503027.eng: Good job! From now on, you’re in charge of guarding the town.
503027.tc: 幹得好！從現在起，你負責守衛這個城鎮。

503031.eng: Your action gained EXPLORATION value. When it’s full, I’ll give you a key to open a chest for rewards.
503031.tc: 你的行動獲得了探索值。當它滿了，我會給你一把鑰匙來打開寶箱獲取獎勵。

503032.eng: So, consuming PSYC gets EXPLORATION value, consuming PIOT gets HEAT value, and both lead to opening more chests and getting better stuff?
503032.tc: 所以，消耗 PSYC 獲得探索值，消耗 PIOT 獲得熱值，兩者都會導致打開更多的寶箱並獲得更好的東西？

503033.eng: Yes, getting rewards from chests is key to survival. How to increase the rewards depends on your actions.
503033.tc: 是的，從寶箱中獲得獎勵是生存的關鍵。如何增加獎勵取決於你的行動。

503034.eng: You have a new key now. Open a new chest and see what you get!
503034.tc: 你現在有一把新鑰匙了。打開一個新寶箱，看看你得到了什麼！

503035.eng: You’re indeed the chosen one, getting both psyc and PIOT.
503035.tc: 你確實是被選中的人，獲得了雙重的靈魂和 PIOT。

503036.tc: 我能獲得更好的東西嗎？

503037.eng: If you want better stuff, check out the town. Building it improves its CIVILIZATION level.
503037.tc: 如果你想獲得更好的東西，去看看這個城鎮。建設它會提高它的文明等級。

503038.eng: What’s the function of CIVILIZATION level?
503038.tc: 文明等級的功能是什麼？

503039.eng: It improves the quality of rewards in the chest.
503039.tc: 它提高了寶箱中獎勵的質量。

503040.eng: So everything’s about the chest. Where does it come from?
503040.tc: 所以一切都是關於寶箱。它從哪裡來？

503041.eng: Exploring this world with questions is fun. You’ll find out the truth someday.
503041.tc: 探索這個世界帶著問題是有趣的。你終將有一天會發現真相。

503042.eng: It seems that collecting resources can really gain EXPLORATION value.
503042.tc: 看來收集資源真的可以獲得探索值。

503043.eng: Now go back and level up the building.

503045.eng: Are you going to cooperate with the gang or fight with them?
503045.tc: 你打算與幫派合作還是與他們戰鬥？

503046.eng: The town was ransacked by those bastards.
503046.tc: 這個城鎮被那些混蛋洗劫了。

503047.eng: You may be the one to save us and recuperate the town.
503047.tc: 你可能是我們的救星，讓城鎮恢復。

503048.eng: We need some material reserves. Try to EXPLORE RESOURCES FOR 3 TIMES and BRING THEM BACK TO ME.
503048.tc: 我們需要一些物資儲備。試著探索資源3次，並將它們帶回給我。

503049.eng: Will you help them EXPLORE RESOURCES FOR 3 TIMES?
503049.tc: 你會幫助他們探索資源3次嗎？

503051.eng: All right. You are indeed qualified TO BE THE LORD.
503051.tc: 好的。你確實有資格成為領主。

503052.eng: Go ahead, there's a lot of things waiting for you.
503052.tc: 繼續前進，有很多事在等你。

503053.eng: You've been a great help. Thank you very much.
503053.tc: 你給了我很大的幫助。非常感謝你。

503054.eng: Now we need to BUILD UP THE HOUSE in the town. Can you give us a hand?
503054.tc: 現在我們需要在城鎮裡建造房屋。你能幫我們嗎？

503055.eng: Lucky guy, we're not going to kill you.
503055.tc: 幸運的傢伙，我們不打算殺了你。

503056.eng: But you will act as our agent and TAKE OVER THE TOWN.
503056.tc: 但你將作為我們的代理人接管這個城鎮。

503057.eng: You've been a great help. Thank you very much.2222222
503057.tc: 你給了我很大的幫助。非常感謝你。2222222

503058.eng: Now we need to BUILD UP THE HOUSE in the town. Can you give us a hand?
503058.tc: 現在我們需要在城鎮裡建造房屋。你能幫我們嗎？

503059.eng: You've been a great help. Thank you very much.3333333
503059.tc: 你給了我很大的幫助。非常感謝你。3333333

503060.eng: Now we need to BUILD UP THE HOUSE in the town. Can you give us a hand?
503060.tc: 現在我們需要在城鎮裡建造房屋。你能幫我們嗎？

503063.eng: How could I continue to survive in this world?
503063.tc: 我該如何在這個世界中繼續生存？

503065.eng: So what should I do now?

503073.eng: Upgrading buildings requires resources, and there are not enough resources to level up.
503073.tc: 升級建築需要資源，目前沒有足夠的資源進行升級。

503074.eng: The improvement of the building level will effectively increase our income speed, and it can also improve the CIVILIZATION level. Now let’s go and collect some resources for upgrading.
503074.tc: 建築升級將有效地提高我們的收入速度，它還可以提高文明等級。現在讓我們去收集一些資源進行升級。

503075.eng: Excuse me, did you come from the north?
503075.tc: 不好意思，你是從北方來的嗎？

503077.eng: Did you see any resources that can be mined over there?
503077.tc: 你在那裡看到可以開採的資源了嗎？

503078.eng: There seems to be some at the foot of the mountain over there, you can go and see.
503078.tc: 似乎在那裡的山腳下有一些，你可以去看看。

503080.eng: Upgrading buildings seems to not only improve civilization level, but also increase exploration value. This is great, you can open a new treasure chest.
503080.tc: 升級建築似乎不僅提高了文明等級，還增加了探索值。這太好了，你可以打開一個新的寶藏箱。

503081.eng: I am indeed the chosen one, and someone will stuff a pillow when I am sleepy.
503081.tc: 我確實是被選中的人，當我困了的時候就有人給我塞枕頭。

503082.eng: Now that the resources for building the town are available, let’s try to level up this barracks building again.
503082.tc: 現在建築城鎮的資源已經有了，讓我們再試一次升級這個兵營建築。

503083.eng: With the barracks, you can recruit soldiers. In this way, if you are injured in battle, there will be soldiers to supplement you.
503083.tc: 有了兵營，你可以招募士兵。這樣，如果你在戰鬥中受傷，就會有士兵來補充你。

503084.eng: But it seems that if you want to develop the town and improve civilization, you still need to explore and collect as much as possible. Just now I saw a relic far outside the town, let’s go and explore it, maybe there will be some unexpected gains.
503084.tc: 但似乎如果你想發展城鎮並提高文明，你仍然需要探索和收集盡可能多的資源。剛才我看到城鎮外有一個遺物，讓我們去探索它，也許會有一些意想不到的收穫。

503085.eng: The wormhole serves as a medium connecting two players, allowing them to attack each other through it. Here, we can set up a lineup for attacking other guys.
503085.tc: 蟲洞是連接兩個玩家的媒介，允許他們通過它互相攻擊。在這裡，我們可以設置一個攻擊其他人的陣容。

503086.eng: When other players attack our town via the wormhole, we can deploy characters to protect it from looting. With the defense set, I'll need to explore further. I noticed a suspicious person lurking nearby. I should check it out.
503086.tc: 當其他玩家通過蟲洞攻擊我們的城鎮時，我們可以部署角色來保護它免受掠奪。有了防禦設置，我需要進一步探索。我注意到附近有一個可疑的人在隱藏。我應該去看看。

503087.eng: Beware! It seems something is coming!

503088.eng: It appears that there are two people coming over to join us.
503088.tc: 看起來有兩個人過來加入我們。

503100.eng: The number of prey has noticeably decreased recently.
503100.tc: 最近的獵物數量顯著減少。

503101.eng: Maybe I can help you hunt.

503102.eng: Really? Help me hunt FIVE wild beasts, I can pay you the reward.
503102.tc: 真的嗎？幫我狩獵五隻野獸，我可以給你獎勵。

503104.eng: I can go and eliminate them.

503105.eng: After you kill three thieves, I will give you a reward.
503105.tc: 在你殺死三個小偷後，我會給你獎勵。

503106.eng: The supplies are becoming increasingly scarce now.
503106.tc: 物資現在變得越來越稀缺了。

503108.eng: Collect any TWO resource point and I will reward you.
503108.tc: 收集任意兩個資源點，我會給你獎勵。

503109.eng: Go hand in the task now

504016.eng: The fortunate one chosen by me.

504017.eng: A survivor who has narrowly escaped the disaster.
504017.tc: 一個僅僅逃脫災難的倖存者。

504018.eng: A surviving ant of a vanished civilization.
504018.tc: 一個消失文明的倖存螞蟻。

504019.eng: Become the executor of my will.

504020.eng: Act as my eyes and hands.

504022.eng: Head to the city in the northeast and gather a team.
504022.tc: 前往東北方的城市並組建一個團隊。

504024.eng: Just wait…Because soon I will reshape this world.
504024.tc: 只需等待…因為很快我將重塑這個世界。

810001.tc: 建築物 %s 的建造等級達到了 %s

810002.eng: Collected resources higher than or equal to lv.%s for %s times
810002.tc: 收集的資源高於或等於等級 %s 的 %s 次

810003.eng: Explored events higher than or equal to lv.%s for %s times
810003.tc: 探索的事件高於或等於等級 %s 的 %s 次

810004.tc: 擁有 %s 名 %s 或更高等級的先鋒

810005.tc: 擁有 %s 名等級高於 %s 的先鋒

810007.eng: Defeated monsters higher than lv.%s for %s times
810007.tc: 擊敗了等級高於 %s 的怪物 %s 次

820001.eng: Highest available quality of teasure chest
820001.tc: 最高可獲得的寶藏箱質量

820004.eng: Vision of main city and troops

900001.eng: A low growl of a wild beast echoed from the shadows, as a wild boar charged at your troops.
900001.tc: 暗影中傳來一陣野獸的低吼，一隻野豬衝向了你的部隊。

900002.eng: A low growl of a wild beast echoed from the shadows, as a lion charged at your troops.
900002.tc: 暗影中傳來一陣野獸的低吼，一隻獅子衝向了你的部隊。

900003.eng: A low growl of a wild beast echoed from the shadows, as a buffalo charged at your troops.
900003.tc: 暗影中傳來一陣野獸的低吼，一隻野牛衝向了你的部隊。

900004.eng: A low growl of a wild beast echoed from the shadows, as a spider charged at your troops.
900004.tc: 暗影中傳來一陣野獸的低吼，一隻蜘蛛衝向了你的部隊。

900005.eng: A low growl of a wild beast echoed from the shadows, as a scorpion charged at your troops.
900005.tc: 暗影中傳來一陣野獸的低吼，一隻蠍子衝向了你的部隊。

900006.eng: A low growl of a wild beast echoed from the shadows, as a double-headed snake charged at your troops.
900006.tc: 暗影中傳來一陣野獸的低吼，一隻雙頭蛇衝向了你的部隊。

900007.eng: A fork in the road appeared before you, and the dilapidated sign still faintly indicated the direction it led to.
900007.tc: 眼前出現了一個岔路口，殘破的路牌上依稀還能認出通往的位置。

900009.eng: Through the misty fog, a natural hot spring emerged before you, sure to alleviate the accumulated fatigue and pain of your subordinates from the long term.
900009.tc: 霧氣繚繞中一口天然的溫泉出現在你的面前，這一定能緩解你的部下們長期累積的疲憊和傷痛。

900010.eng: You discovered a treasure site, still incredibly precious despite the long passage of time.
900010.tc: 你發現了一處藏寶點，儘管經歷了漫長的歲月依舊無比珍貴。

900011.eng: Your view was occupied by dense spider webs; this is a spider's nest.
900011.tc: 你的视线被密密麻麻的蜘蛛網所佔據，這是一處蜘蛛巢穴。

900012.eng: Before you was a group of lethargic lions; your guide told you that you could avoid conflict with them by offering food.
900012.tc: 眼前是一群懶散的獅群，你的導遊告訴你可以通過上供食物避免與它們發生衝突。

900013.eng: In the desolate grasslands, a migrating herd was moving, with many weak beasts dying from trampling.
900013.tc: 荒蕪的草原中有一群遷徙中的獸群，不少孱弱的野獸因為踩踏而死亡。

900014.eng: Following the earth-shaking roar, you saw two giant beasts fighting for territory, both already weakened, which might be your opportunity.
900014.tc: 跟隨著震天的巨響，你看到了兩隻正在爭奪地盤的巨獸，雙方都已虛弱不堪，這也許是你的机会。

900015.eng: An abandoned excavation site appeared in your sight, seemingly with many treasures still worth looking forward to hidden within.
900015.tc: 一座廢棄的挖掘點出現在你的视线內，看起來應該還有不少值得期待的寶物埋藏在內。

900028.eng: Pick up some carcasses as sustenance
900028.tc: 撿走一些屍體當作食物

900045.eng: Consume 5% of the troop strength to obtain a random item
900045.tc: 消耗5%兵力，獲得一個隨機道具

900076.eng: The gloomy, withered forest, home to many beasts with lower threat levels
900076.tc: 幽暗的枯樹森林，棲息著許多威脅度較低的野獸

900077.eng: The harsh and brutal conditions of the wilderness
900077.tc: 生存條件殘酷的蠻荒之地

900078.tc: 一座早已被人遺忘的礦井

900079.eng: A canyon rumored to be haunted by giant beasts
900079.tc: 傳聞有巨獸出沒的峽谷

920018.tc: 再完成4次與事件的交互

920032.eng: Attack and win against another player
920032.tc: 對其他玩家城池進攻並取勝

920033.eng: Interact with NPC on the map

920040.tc: 對其他玩家城市攻擊並取勝5次

920049.tc: 再完成10次與事件的交互

920050.tc: 對其他玩家城市攻擊並取勝10次

920056.tc: 對其他玩家城市攻擊並取勝10次

920086.tc: 對其他玩家城市攻擊並取勝10次

920092.tc: 對其他玩家城市攻擊並取勝10次

920098.tc: 對其他玩家城市攻擊並取勝10次

1070011.eng:
Treaty of Kadesh:
City Vision +1
Troop Vision +1
1070011.tc:
卡迭什條約：
城市視野 +1
部隊視野 +1

1070017.tc:
統治：
對牲畜的傷害 +50%

1070023.tc:
毀滅：
對人類的傷害 +15%

1080011.eng: Discover the enemy's weakness and increase attack damage by 20%
1080011.tc: 發現敵人的弱點，提升攻擊傷害20%

1080012.eng: Every 3 attacks, an additional attack causing 75% damage will be added.
1080012.tc: 每攻擊3次，追加1次造成75%傷害的攻擊

1080013.eng: Each attack has a 10% chance of causing 200% attack damage
1080013.tc: 每次攻擊有10%幾率造成200%的攻擊傷害

1090051.eng: Tinuvel is a beacon of hope in this post-apocalyptic wasteland. Her visions guide the survivors towards safety and sustenance.
1090051.tc: 汀烏韋爾是這個末日荒原中的希望燈塔。她的異象引導倖存者們朝安全和食物的方向前進。

1090071.eng: Keen, known for his unmatched speed and agility, wields dual blades with deadly precision.
1090071.tc: 銳利，以其無與倫比的速度和敏捷性聞名，雙刃揮舞得致命精確。

1090081.eng: His reputation was built on the smoking barrels of his twin pistols, each a tale of survival.
1090081.tc: 他的名聲是建立在他雙槍冒煙的槍管上，每個都是生存的故事。

1090091.eng: John, the lone hunter, tracks his prey across the barren lands. His survival skills are as sharp as the arrows in his quiver.
1090091.tc: 約翰，孤獨的獵人，在荒蕪的土地上追蹤他的獵物。他的求生技能和他箭囊裡的箭一樣銳利。

1090301.eng: An old chief, could pass away at any moment
1090301.tc: 一位老村長，隨時可能去世

1090321.eng: In name a doctor, but in reality…
1090321.tc: 名義上是醫生，但實際上...

1090331.eng: His life is a mockery of the apocalypse.
1090331.tc: 他的生命是對末日的嘲諷。

1090351.eng: An unknown traveler, who perhaps has seen places abundant with resources.
1090351.tc: 一位未知的旅行者，也許已經看過資源豐富的地方。

1100041.eng: A testament to a bygone civilization, their crumbling stones whispering tales of the past.
1100041.tc: 這是一個已經消逝的文明的見證，他們破碎的石頭低語著過去的故事。

1100051.eng: A treacherous labyrinth home to the elusive and deadly Sand Spiders, guarding ancient secrets beneath the desert sands.
1100051.tc: 一個危險的迷宮，是難以捉摸並且致命的沙蜘蛛的家，守衛著沙漠沙下的古老秘密。

1100061.eng: A monumental structure pulsating with power, harnessing the elements to fuel the technological marvels of its time.
1100061.tc: 一個巨大的結構，充滿力量，利用元素來驅動其時代的技術奇觀。

1100071.eng: The Aquatic Ruins lie submerged in the depths, a watery grave to a once-thriving aquatic civilization, now a haunting reminder of their aquatic prowess.
1100071.tc: 水下遺跡沉沒在深處，是一個曾經繁榮的水上文明的水葬，現在是他們水上能力的令人毛骨悚然的提醒。

1100081.eng: The Village Undercroft is a subterranean expanse beneath a quaint village, where echoes of the surface world blend with the mysteries of the deep.
1100081.tc: 村莊地下室是一個位於可愛村莊地下的廣闊空間，地面世界的回聲與深處的神秘混合在一起。

1100091.eng: A symbol of mechanical ingenuity from an era lost to time.
1100091.tc: 一個象徵著失落時代機械穎悟的符號。

1100141.eng: It is a hypothetical tunnel through space-time, bridging distant points in the universe and offering a tantalizing shortcut through the cosmos.
1100141.tc: 這是一個假想的空間時間隧道，連接宇宙中遙遠的點，提供了一個穿越宇宙的誘人捷徑。

1100201.eng: The character %s lacks stamina. Should you spend %s of %s to replenish %s stamina for the character? There are %s remaining purchases today.
1100201.tc: 角色%s體力不足，是否花費%s數量的%s為角色補充%s體力，今日剩餘購買次數%s。

1100202.eng: Investigation requires the consumption of %s psyc. Should we proceed with the investigation.
1100202.tc: 偵查需要消耗%s的psyc，是否進行偵查。

1100204.eng: When there are no troops, characters can only collect data
1100204.tc: 角色在沒有部隊時，只能進行採集

1100205.eng: Please follow the prompts to complete the beginner guide. Click on the dialog box above to receive the guide prompt.
1100205.tc: 請按提示完成初學者指南。 点击上面的對話方塊以接收指南提示。
